Entry.JapaneseText: <Dio>
Entry.EnglishText: <Dio>

Entry.JapaneseText: バジル
Entry.EnglishText: Basil

Entry.JapaneseText: <Chester>
Entry.EnglishText: <Chester>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Mel>
Entry.EnglishText: <Mel>

Entry.JapaneseText: 危険な魔界の住人
<Cless>
Entry.EnglishText: <Cless>

Entry.JapaneseText: グレムリンレアー
Variable
どうしてだよ！ バジルさん！
Entry.EnglishText: Mister Basil, please! Please tell me why you're doing this!

Entry.JapaneseText: 魔法で世界の人、 救うんじゃなかったのか！
Entry.EnglishText: This isn't helping the world using magic!

Entry.JapaneseText: 救いたかったのは、 世界なんてものじゃない、 <Red>ヴァルハラ<White>の人たちだ！
Entry.EnglishText: I never wanted to help this world at all, Valhalla's people is what I wanted to help!

Entry.JapaneseText: でも、アルヴァニスタは、 人工マナの材料である 『紅の月』の情報を流して
Entry.EnglishText: But Alvanista had to interfere. They circulated the information of the resources for the artificial Mana to the "Red Moon."

Entry.JapaneseText: 金目当ての採掘者どもをあおり、 結果、採掘者と住民との間の 衝突を看過した！
Entry.EnglishText: They contracted a large number of miners to work on the extraction of materials. The result? A conflict between the miners and the citizens for the place. One conflict they completely ignored.

Entry.JapaneseText: で、<Red>ヴァルハラ<White>の連中は、 採掘者たちに 街を追い出された……
Entry.EnglishText: ...Then Valhalla folks got kicked out of their own city by the miners...

Entry.JapaneseText: そうだ…… 何人も寒さや飢えで 死んだ
Entry.EnglishText: Correct. Many people were killed for stupid reasons.

Entry.JapaneseText: アルヴァニスタは 何もしてくれなかった…… 見殺しにしたのさ！
Entry.EnglishText: Meanwhile Alvanista did absolutely nothing... Nothing but watch people suffer!

Entry.JapaneseText: だから、 無差別に人殺しする 連中の力借りんのか！？
Entry.EnglishText: So in return the citizens thought indiscriminately killing people was an answer!?

Entry.JapaneseText: そんな ヒドイ奴らの力を……！
Entry.EnglishText: That's a horrible power...! This isn't what you wanted!

Entry.JapaneseText: 使えるヤツらなら、 それがどんなヤツだろうと 関係ない
Entry.EnglishText: If it helps the people from Valhalla then I don't care what happens to anyone else.

Entry.JapaneseText: 魔科学と引き換えに あの村を守れるんなら！
Entry.EnglishText: I must replace Magitechnology to protect the village!

Entry.JapaneseText: 魔科学を……！？
Entry.EnglishText: Magitechnology, you say!?

Entry.JapaneseText: なんだよ……そんなんで、 全部自分の夢、 台無しにしちまうのかよ……
Entry.EnglishText: Why...? Then all you told me were lies? All my dreams are useless, then...?

Entry.JapaneseText: なぁっ！ 夢は思い続けないと 叶わないって言ったよな！？
Entry.EnglishText: WHY!? Didn't you say dreams won't come true unless we wish to see them through to the end!?

Entry.JapaneseText: その僕の夢がみんなを、 あの村をメチャクチャに したんだ！
Entry.EnglishText: Everyone said my dream to help the village was a pipedream...

Entry.JapaneseText: もういい……
Entry.EnglishText: And you know what...?

Entry.JapaneseText: 夢なんて、思い続けてたって 叶いやしない…… 叶うわけがない！！
Entry.EnglishText: They were right! No matter how hard you try ...dreams don't come true!

Entry.JapaneseText: ウソだよ……どうして、 そんなこと言うんだよ…… バジルさん……
Entry.EnglishText: You're joking, right? This isn't funny... Why are you saying this, Mister Basil? You aren't like this, right?

Entry.JapaneseText: 僕が君に言った なんにでもなれるなんて話は、 妄想なんだよ！
Entry.EnglishText: What I've told you back then, all that talk about dreams... was complete bullshit!

Entry.JapaneseText: うわぁあっ！！
Entry.EnglishText: Woaaah!!

Entry.JapaneseText: バジルさん！！
Entry.EnglishText: No! Mister Basil!

Entry.JapaneseText: ご苦労さん
Entry.EnglishText: Nicely done, human.

Entry.JapaneseText: まったく、つまらん禁呪文で オイラたちを操ろうなんて、 とんでもねぇ男だ
Entry.EnglishText: Did this man really think he could control us with such pathetic Demonic Manipulation skills...? How stupid.

Entry.JapaneseText: おまえは…… グレムリンレアー……！
Entry.EnglishText: You are... Gremlin's Lair!

Entry.JapaneseText: おや、誰かと思えば、 前にオイラ騙して、無理矢理 契約させた奴じゃないの
Entry.EnglishText: Oh? A familiar face. Get out of my way, you aren't with the summoning guy able to make impossible pacts.

Entry.JapaneseText: な、なぜだ…… なぜ僕の魔操術が…… 効かない……
Entry.EnglishText: W-why isn't my magic working on you...?

Entry.JapaneseText: あんたのそれ通用すんの 下っ端の魔族だけだよ？
Entry.EnglishText: Do you think you managed to come this far solely due to your magic?

Entry.JapaneseText: 魔界の王プルート様も 感謝してるぜ。 魔界の門を開いてくれてさ
Entry.EnglishText: You should be thanking Lord of Daemonium Pluto for this feat. We've been just using you to open the door.

Entry.JapaneseText: うわぁああっ！！
Entry.EnglishText: Uhhhh

Entry.JapaneseText: バジルさんを……
Entry.EnglishText: Let go...

Entry.JapaneseText: ……はなせ！
Entry.EnglishText: OF MR. BASIL!

Entry.JapaneseText: オイラとやるってかい？ いいよ、相手になろう じゃないの！
Entry.EnglishText: Do you want to fight? All right, I'll shred you to pieces!
